instruction: looking for a hilarious high school comedy about a crazy party night
output: If you want a wild, laugh-out-loud high school comedy, you gotta watch Superbad! 🍻😂 It’s all about two nerdy seniors trying to throw the ultimate party before graduation — complete chaos and so much fun! 🎉

instruction: recommend me a funny coming-of-age movie with some crazy teenage antics
output: Superbad is perfect for that! 🎬 It’s a hilarious coming-of-age story full of awkward moments, crazy party vibes, and best buddy fun. Jonah Hill and Michael Cera totally nail it! 😄🍕

instruction: any good movies about high school friends and their last crazy night?
output: You should check out Superbad! It’s all about two best friends trying to make their last night before graduation unforgettable — with lots of laughs, chaos, and awkwardness! 🎉😆 Totally a classic teen comedy! 🍔
